channel.title: [Approved] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-DKTDRC
channel.description:
The following addition to the [IATI Organisation identifier](http://iatistandard.org/203/codelists/IATIOrganisationIdentifier/) list has been proposed for DKT RD Congo. It has previously been concluded that no stable identifiers currently exist for organisations that are registered in DRC (https://github.com/org-id/register/issues/292).
**Code:** XI-IATI-DKTDRC **Name:** DKT RD Congo **Description:** DKT RD Congo is an NGO active in reproductive health and a subsidiary of DKT International based in Washington DC. DKT International is a registered, non-profit organization founded in 1989 to focus the power of social marketing on some of the largest countries with the greatest needs for family planning, HIV/AIDS prevention and safe abortion **URL:** http://www.dkt-rdc.net/
If no objection is received, this XI-IATI code will be approved and added in a week.

item.title: [Approved] New Organisation Identifier: XI-IATI-DKTDRC
item.dc:creator: IATI-techteam
item.description:
As there have been no objections to this request, XI-IATI-DKTDRC is now considered approved and will be added to the codelist in due course.

Read full topic
